name: Johann Hubert Sonntagbauer
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I develop UI FrontEnds for a living. Everyone wants a Browser based UI nowadays so the connection with Javascript is inevitable. But I like the possiblities and open mind culture of the communities.
what_can_i_contribute: Hope to meet people to discuss trends in UI development and how to takle the problems in the industry. Looking forward to have a good time.
